issues.description: The solutionâ€™s toString method declares a return type of Object instead of String, preventing it from correctly overriding the standard toString() method as described in the problem. This mismatch will cause a compilation error and confuse students expecting to implement the canonical String toString().
issues.suggested_fix: Change the method signature in Lecture.java to 'public String toString()' so that it correctly overrides Object.toString() and returns a String.
